page.title: 09FUN IN DRUMNADROCHIT
page.content: There is very little for the young people to do in the evenings,so many people hang around the shop talking and larking about or going to the local {Youth Club}to listen to records and play pool etc. A few stay at home and watch television. As there are no{ Cinemas or Theatres in Drumnadrochit people make their own {Entertainment. At the weekends{Discos ,Ceilidhs}and Sales of Work occasionally take place in the{Glenurquhart Public Hall.}For the adults there are the {Pubs}and Clubs where Bands sometimes play or else they go to Inverness where there is a wider choice of {Entertainment. {The}younger people also go to Town if they have the money.They go to visit the Cinema or to wander around the shops and buy records and clothes.
